<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="626" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-expandvectorpredication-cpp-/#aedba47828740c9315142ae92e6e901ae"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-expandvectorpredication-cpp-/#aedba47828740c9315142ae92e6e901ae">sanitizeStrategy</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpintrinsic">VPIntrinsic</a> &amp;VPI, <a href="#a8bbe0bdae41c88a50d5776a8b6bd9d5c">VPLegalization</a> &amp;LegalizeStrat) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Operations with speculatable lanes do not strictly need predication.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Converting a speculatable VP intrinsic means dropping %mask and %evl.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// No need to expand %evl into the %mask only to ignore that code.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LegalizeStrat.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targettransforminfo/vplegalization/#a077db45fab76ac717888ddd702b6f9bf">OpStrategy</a> == <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targettransforminfo/vplegalization/#abf988827c40fdf90a1e08a8e2cddea0da2a58508bab01c3fba0c3c912ed82e89d">VPLegalization::Convert</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LegalizeStrat.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targettransforminfo/vplegalization/#a94e1d5306640457b340c5d5045fc3532">EVLParamStrategy</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targettransforminfo/vplegalization/#abf988827c40fdf90a1e08a8e2cddea0dad89a9e5c9cb303fe1dedf3a40d899015">VPLegalization::Discard</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We have to preserve the predicating effect of %evl for this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// non-speculatable VP intrinsic.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1) Never discard %evl.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="639"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2) If this VP intrinsic will be expanded to non-VP code, make sure that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="640"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    %evl gets folded into %mask.</span></CodeLine>
